casebody.data:
No. 10-528. Grady Roland Pugh, Sr., and Roland Pugh Construction, Inc., Petitioners v. United States. 562 U.S. 1270, 131 S. Ct. 1600,

179 L. Ed. 2d 499,

2011 U.S. LEXIS 2082. March 7, 2011.

Petition for writ of cer-tiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Eleventh Circuit denied.

Same case below, 605 F.3d 1152.
